results.title: Amanda Seyfried Finally Stakes Her Claim
results.abstract: The “Mean Girls” and “Mamma Mia!” actress knows her performance as Marion Davies in“Mank” will be a turning point in her career. But first, she had to put some distance between herself and Hollywood.

results.title: How to Pretend You’re in Tokyo

results.title: Michel Robin, Longtime French Character Actor, Dies at 90
results.abstract: Best known in the United States for his role in the 2001 film “Amélie,” he was a staple of the Comédie-Française theater company and a familiar supporting actor in dozens of movies.

multimedia.caption: The French actor Michel Robin in 1990, when he won an award as best supporting actor for his role in the play “La Traversée de l’Hiver” (“Winter Crossing”).

results.title: Some Movies Actually Understand Poverty in America
